Rusty Iron Sword.description: An old and rusty sword, barely sharp.

Grandfather's Hunting Bow.description: A bow passed down through generations, still functional.

Woodcutting Axe.description: An axe used for chopping wood, now repurposed for battle.

Bendy Spear.description: A spear that bends slightly, not very reliable.

Handful of Marbles.description: A small handful of marbles, not sure how they got here...

Enchanted Dagger.description: A small dagger that glows with a faint magical light.

poison_strike.description: Chance to poison the enemy, dealing additional damage over time.

inspect.level_1: The dagger seems sharper than usual.
inspect.level_2: You notice faint runes etched along the blade, glowing with energy.

Knight's Longsword.description: A well-crafted longsword, standard issue for knights.

armor_pierce.description: Has a chance to ignore enemy armor.

inspect.level_2: The hilt is engraved with a knight's crest, symbolizing its high quality.

Stormcaller Staff.description: A staff imbued with the power of storms, crackling with electricity.

lightning_strike.description: Casts a lightning bolt that can chain to nearby enemies.

inspect.level_1: The staff vibrates slightly, as if containing immense power.
inspect.level_2: You notice storm clouds forming briefly around the tip as you hold it.

Shadowblade.description: A blade forged from shadows, difficult to see and even harder to defend against.

backstab.description: Deals extra damage when attacking from behind.

inspect.level_1: The blade is almost invisible in dim light.
inspect.level_2: You notice the blade seems to absorb light, making it blend into the shadows.

Flamebrand.description: A sword with a blade that burns with an eternal flame.

flame_strike.description: Has a chance to set the enemy on fire, dealing damage over time.

inspect.level_1: The blade is warm to the touch, even when sheathed.
inspect.level_2: You realize the flame is not normal fire; it burns without fuel.
